mapper.select: SELECT mb_idx , mb_id , mb_nickname , CAST(mb_level AS SIGNED) as mb_level , mb_regdate , CAST(mb_status AS SIGNED) as mb_status FROM ad_member
SELECT mb_idx , mb_id , mb_nickname , CAST(mb_level AS SIGNED) as mb_level , CAST(mb_status AS SIGNED) as mb_status FROM ad_member WHERE mb_idx = #{mb_idx}
